Operator# +(_:_:)

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
static func + (lhs: Self.Stride, rhs: Self) -> Self
```

Available when `Self` conforms to `_Pointer`.## [See Also](/documentation/swift/strideable/+(_:_:)-94mlm#see-also)

### [Getting an Offset Value](/documentation/swift/strideable/+(_:_:)-94mlm#Getting-an-Offset-Value)

[`func advanced(by: Self.Stride) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/strideable/advanced(by:))Returns a value that is offset the specified distance from this value.**Required** Default implementation provided.
